title: DebtClassEnum
description: Represents an enumeration list that identifies the type of debt.

oneOf.title: AssetBacked
oneOf.description: Identifies a debt instrument that has periodic income payments and value derived from or backed by a specified pool of underlying assets which could be mortgages or other obligations.

oneOf.title: Convertible
oneOf.description: Identifies a debt instrument that can be converted into common shares.

oneOf.title: HolderConvertible
oneOf.description: Identifies a debt instrument that can be converted primarily at the election of the holder into common shares of the Issuer.

oneOf.title: HolderExchangeable
oneOf.description: Identifies a debt instrument that can be converted primarily at the election of the holder into common shares of a party other than the Issuer.

oneOf.title: IssuerConvertible
oneOf.description: Identifies a debt instrument that can be converted at the election of the Issuer into common shares of the Issuer.  Also known as reverse convertible.

oneOf.title: IssuerExchangeable
oneOf.description: Identifies a debt instrument that can be converted at the election of the Issuer into common shares of a party other than the Issuer.  Also known as reverse exchangeable.

oneOf.title: RegCap
oneOf.description: Identifies a debt instrument as one issued by financial institutions to count towards regulatory capital, including term and perpetual subordinated debt, contingently convertible and others.  Excludes preferred share capital.

oneOf.title: Structured
oneOf.description: Identifies a debt instrument athat has non-standard interest or principal features, with full recourse to the issuer.

oneOf.title: Vanilla
oneOf.description: Identifies a debt instrument that has a periodic coupon, a defined maturity, and is not backed by any specific asset. The seniority and the structure of the income and principal payments can optionally be defined in DebtType.DebtEconomics.
